ygData.subject: Are request or response handling filters part of connectors?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am wondering, whether things like Apache request handlers (e.g. what is happening in the translation phase of Apache) or filters (e.g. loging filter) one

Subject: Are request or response handling filters part of connectors?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=289191104; y=cwDziS7Pue8ktvM2KPtnW3-xMSaxFei7tZ0Bcmh-5i0oMicYOc0m_kfW
X-Yahoo-Profile: algermissen1971

I am wondering, whether 'things' like Apache request handlers (e.g. what is happening in the translation phase of Apache) or filters (e.g. loging filter) one adds to a a Client object in Jersey are considered part of the connector or part of the component?


I think 'connector' but would like a second opinion.

Thanks,

Jan
